name: Blade of the Fallen Fairies
description:
The will of the Fallen Fairy resides, they will fight until they die. See how long you can last, and find the secrets that have been cast.

Swarm of foes will strike you down, unless your mind and sight is sound.

Wield the blade of the last Undead Fairy as they avenge the fallen against the Eternal Horde of the Vile Fays.  

Harness the supernatural speed of the Fairy as they strike down an ever-encroaching army. But beware as they too wield blinding speed. How many foes will you be able to vanquish until the Fairy draws their last breath?  

#extragamejam

Controls

W,A,S,D - movement

Left Mouse - Strike

Right Mouse Hold - Hold Breath

Right Mouse Release - Quick Dash

Space bar - Jump

R - Reset

Esc - Quit
